Notes: Time series. This is the most recent fitted value. Fitted assuming B_y normal with mean Mu_y and variance [see paper], where B_y is predicted birth rate and gamma inflates binomial variance for overdispersion. Paper also contains covariates for determining how contaminants and environmental fluctuations will affect birth rate. HOWEVER birth rate model has a lot of overdispersion for the variance so there are likely other factors affecting birth rates.
